content: आवप् {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To scatter, throw about; वयोभ्यश्चावपेद्भुवि <ls>Mb.</ls>; so अक्षान् throws. {@--2@} To sow (as seed). {@--3@} To fit in, insert. {@--4@} To pour out or forth. {@--5@} To offer (as in a sacrifice), perform (as a Śrāddha). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To shave, cut off. {@--2@} To trim. {@--3@} To mix with.
